message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DM, cs.CC, cs.DS, cs.CG. 

The paper deals with the construction of perfect codes using tilings of the Hamming cube, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT) and discrete mathematics (cs.DM). The use of metrics to determine the perfect codes is related to coding theory (cs.CC) and computational geometry (cs.CG). Finally, the paper also discusses procedures to obtain new perfect codes, which could be related to algorithms and data structures (cs.DS).
